name: DIVINE PEARL: Survivors
description:
DIVINE PEARL™: Survivors is a bullet heaven survival game set in a shonen anime world, unleash energy wave attacks and increase your power level on each new planet.

Great warriors from across the galaxy have arrived to collect the Divine Pearls, which grant power to those who hold them. However the greater your power, the greater the opponents who want to take it for themselves.

FEATURES

  • Collect divine pearls from fallen enemies to increase your power level, then take the fight to them.
  • Unlock devastating abilities to send any who oppose your strength to the afterlife.
  • Unlock new characters, upgrades, challenges, stages and optional content.
  • Unlock new ways to play with stage modifying options.
  • 20 minute run timer, survive the increasing influx of enemies.
  • Travel to the outer reaches of the galaxy, the afterlife containing hell itself, and more.
